events.description: A continued decline in technology stocks impacting major US indices.
Alphabet reported earnings and revenue that beat expectations but flagged higher AI spending.
Qualcomm issued a disappointing financial outlook.
Scheduled earnings release for Amazon after the market close.

facts.fact_text: S&P 500 futures fell 0.5%, Nasdaq 100 futures fell 0.8%, and Dow Jones futures dropped approximately 120 points.

evidences.evidence_text: S&P 500 futures down 0.5%, Nasdaq 100 futures falling 0.8%, and Dow Jones futures shedding around 120 points

facts.fact_text: Alphabet shares decreased by 5% despite exceeding earnings and revenue forecasts.

evidences.evidence_text: Alphabet slid 5% after flagging a sharp increase in AI spending this year, despite beating earnings and revenue expectations

facts.fact_text: Qualcomm shares dropped nearly 11% following a disappointing outlook.

evidences.evidence_text: Qualcomm plunged nearly 11% after issuing a disappointing outlook

claims.claim_text: The market decline is driven by persistent worries regarding AI disruption and high stock valuations.

evidences.evidence_text: continued amid persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and elevated valuations

claims.claim_text: The recent sell-off has eliminated all year-to-date gains for the Nasdaq 100.

evidences.evidence_text: erased the Nasdaq 100’s gains for the year continued

evidence.evidence_text: continued amid persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and elevated valuations
continued amid persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and elevated valuations
Qualcomm plunged nearly 11% after issuing a disappointing outlook
Alphabet slid 5% after flagging a sharp increase in AI spending this year
